tags.name: metadata
tags.description: Methods for creating metadata to pass to the Virtual Watershed data management platform

post.summary: Provide a reduced set of fields to generate VW JSON and XML data all in one. Used to insert data and record to VWDM
post.description: Our Python API (vw-py) provides functions to write full Virtual Watershed Data Management service metadata using only a few of the fields, either inferring the rest from the file or context. Through this route you can use the same functionality in a language-agnostic way.

parameters.name: kwargs
parameters.description: JSON string with required fields. All fields below are in fact required except for parent_model_run_uuid.  If this is not given, the given model_run_uuid becomes the parent_model_run_uuid as well; that is, it is its own parent.
parameters.default: {"input_file": "example.nc", "model_name": "isnobal", "model_set": "inputs", "parent_model_run_uuid": "a94cbfe3-8e41-4de0-89b2-b67b43e5c3b9", "model_run_uuid": "33fd4a47-74c7-4dff-9a82-be30bc852833", "start_datetime": "2010-10-01T00:00:00", "end_datetime": "2011-09-30T23:00:00", "description": "ISNOBAL model run investigating climate effects in WY 2011 in Reynolds Creek", "watershed_name": "Reynolds Creek", "state": "Idaho"}
